# DrLambda.ai

> AI-powered platform

## About

DrLambda.ai is an AI-powered platform designed to help users with intelligent automation and insights.

## Contact

- Website: https://drlambda.ai
- Email: contact@drlambda.ai

## Key Pages

- Home: https://drlambda.ai
- About: https://drlambda.ai/about
- Blog: https://drlambda.ai/blog

## Technologies

- Framework: Next.js 15
- UI: React 19
- Styling: Tailwind CSS 4
